caption.title: Supplementary video S1
caption.p: Monitoring of non-NS1-treated differentiated microvascular endothelial cells by time-lapse microscopy. Microvascular endothelial TIME cells were grown in Matrigel for 16 h, after which cells had differentiated and formed tubular structures. Video S1 show that during an additional 9 h of culture without NS1 treatment, the vessel-like structures were still intact.
